product_name: REI  Universal Adapter Plug Kit - Set of 4
long_description: This Universal Adapter Plug Kit plugs into most electrical outlets in more than 175 countries, including most parts of Africa, Asia, Europe, the Middle East, New Zealand, North America and Russia
